spell.name: Brenatto's Voltaic Bolt
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a ranged weapon attack before the spell ends, electricity crackles off your ranged weapon or ammunition to deal an additional {@damage 3d6} lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d6|2-9|1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Widowgast's Transmogrification

m.text: damp clay equal to the weight of the target and 150 gp worth of crushed gem dust, both of which the spell consumes

entries: You permanently alter the physical body of a humanoid creature into another type of humanoid body. After encasing the target in clay, you conduct a rigorous, one-hour-long ritual that manipulates the flesh and function of the target's body into that of another humanoid race. They lose their previous racial traits and instead gain the racial traits of another humanoid race of the target's choice, aside from their languages known (which remain unchanged). Should the target wish to alter their sex along with or instead of their race, they can choose to do so as part of the spell. When the ritual is completed, both you and the target gain one level of exhaustion.
Once a creature's race or gender has been changed via this spell, they cannot be affected by this spell again for 1 year.

spell.name: Widowgast's Vault of Amber
entries: You arrange the gems in a loose circle around any non-living material and tracing Transmutative sigils above each of them. All materials within the circle are pulled into the largest of the gems, becoming stored in stasis. While stored, the material doesn't weather, age, or rot. The gem can hold up to 500lbs of material.

The caster can use an Action to speak a command word, chosen while casting the spell, to release the stored contents of the gem onto the ground. The contents are also released if the spell is dispelled.

spell.name: Widowgast's Web of Fire

components.m: a cat's cradel of thread or string coated in phosphorus

entries: Striking your palms upon the ground, a web of flame to crackles out around you and streaks towards up to five creatures the caster can see within range. The fire then explodes upward into a column of flame. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 8d6} fire damage on a failed save, and half on a sucess.
Alternatively, you can cause all five streaks to fire to converge on a single target, intensifying the damage to {@damage 12d6} fire damage.
The fire can travel over objects up to 5 feet high, but cannot travel through water. Flammable objects in the fire's path that aren't being worn or carried are ignited.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d6|4-9|1d6} for each slot level above 4th.
